short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Visualizes keys as you press them, for screencast or presentation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When activated, this extension overlays the current tab with a real-time display of your key presses:
* Text input is shown as typed.
* Special keys are labeled with descriptions, e.g. [Escape] or [Control+Shift+A].
* Repeated presses are summarized, e.g. [ArrowUp x 5].
